official_title: To designate the United States Courthouse under construction at 1030 Southwest 3rd Avenue, Portland, Oregon, as the "Mark O. Hatfield United States Courthouse", and for other purposes.

summary.text: Designates the United States Courthouse under construction at 1030 Southwest 3rd Avenue in Portland, Oregon, as the Mark O. Hatfield United States Courthouse.
